messages.content: You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Monthly Easy Card Plus package.
What does the Monthly Easy Card Plus package include?
Can you tell me what's offered in the Monthly Easy Card Plus package?
What are the benefits of the Telenor Monthly Easy Card Plus package?

The Monthly Easy Card Plus package includes 25GB of internet, 5000 on-net minutes, 500 off-net minutes, and 5000 SMS for Rs. 870 including tax. The package is valid for 30 days and can be activated by dialing *345*125#.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Monthly Easy Card Plus package.
How can I activate the Monthly Easy Card Plus package?
What is the method to subscribe to the Monthly Easy Card Plus package?
How do I get the Monthly Easy Card Plus package?
You can activate the Monthly Easy Card Plus package by dialing *345*125#. The package offers 25GB of internet, 5000 on-net minutes, 500 off-net minutes, and 5000 SMS for 30 days.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Monthly Easy Card Plus package.
Who is eligible for the Monthly Easy Card Plus package?
Can all Telenor customers subscribe to the Monthly Easy Card Plus package?
What are the eligibility criteria for the Monthly Easy Card Plus package?
All Telenor Prepaid customers are eligible for the Monthly Easy Card Plus package.
You are a chatbot for Telenor Pakistan providing information about the Monthly Easy Card Plus package.
How long is the Monthly Easy Card Plus package valid?
What is the validity period of the Monthly Easy Card Plus package?
For how many days does the Monthly Easy Card Plus package remain active?
The Monthly Easy Card Plus package is valid for 30 days from the date of subscription. Subscribers will be notified once the package expires.
